EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge: Further Information Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.00NC0000004a6DQ} {!Contact.00NC0000004a6Da}
We are looking forward to having {!Contact.FirstName} take part in The Challenge.
Please click on the link to complete this form to provide us with some necessary further information about {!Contact.FirstName} http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a12f0ba6986d95&q1={!Contact.Id}
The form includes full medical, behavioural and dietary information, and the name, telephone number and address of {!Contact.FirstName}'s GP. Please complete this form as soon as possible.
If {!Contact.FirstName} suffers any illness or significant injury after your completion of this form, please immediately notify us of this in writing.
If you have any questions about this form, or if you would prefer to complete a paper version, please do contact us on contact@the-challenge.org, or by telephone on 020 7921 4404.
We will be in touch in due course with further details regarding the programme. We will also be holding a meeting before the summer to give you the opportunity to meet with us shortly before The Challenge begins.
The Challenge Network
